about_the_game:
A collection of behind the scenes content for MetaWare High School (Demo), offering a glimpse into the development of the game.

Includes:
  • An artbook (45 pages) with extensive developer commentary, unreleased/in-progress art, and more.
  • A collection of unused music.
  • A playable unfinished early prototype of the game. (~10 minutes playtime)
  • A warm thank you from Not Fun Games.
detailed_description:

Includes:

  • A playable unfinished early prototype of the game. (~10 minutes playtime)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+
  • Processor: CPU: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo (64 bit only)
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
